verbose_text: It is worth noting that estrogen acting through its receptors, increases activity of N-methyl-D-aspartic acid (NMDA) receptors in DRG, causing release of pro nociceptive neuropeptides such as substance P, CGRP and brain derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF).
evidence: estrogen acting through its receptors, increases activity of N-methyl-D-aspartic acid
